articles.title: High Frequency Trading Triggers a Showdown Over a London Rooftop
articles.description: A little-known technology firm took on the London Stock Exchange Group for access to its rooftop in a bid to speed up its trades by billionths of seconds.
articles.content:
A little-known technology firm took on the London Stock Exchange Group for access to its rooftop in a bid to speed up its trades by billionths of seconds.

articles.title: Asia stocks rise on AI optimism, investors gird for Fed, tech earnings
articles.description: Asian shares got a lift from Wall Street on Wednesday thanks to a fresh wave of optimism over artificial intelligence, as investors braced for a busy day headlined by the Federal Reserve's decision and earnings from technology heavyweights.

articles.title: Amazon Announces Mass Layoffs, Citing 'Transformative' AI Technology
articles.description: Corporate giant Amazon cites its use of artificial intelligence to increase efficiency and speed as its cuts 14,000 jobs.
articles.content:
Amazon is shedding corporate jobs as its embrace of artificial intelligence reduces its need for humans.
